meaning_str.bing:
n. 傻瓜；蠢人；弄臣；奶油果泥
v. 愚弄；欺骗；说蠢话
adj. 傻的；愚蠢的
网络. 傻子；愚人；笨蛋

傻瓜；蠢人；弄臣；奶油果泥

傻瓜；蠢人；受骗者；容易受欺的人；（旧时国王或王后豢养供人娱乐的）小丑；弄臣；戏剧中的愚蠢角色
欺骗；戏弄；说蠢话；干傻事（常为逗乐）；消遣；胡闹；轻率行事；（轻浮地）调情
愚蠢的；傻的；无知的；易受骗的

1.en: as sport to a fool to do mischief: but a man of understanding hath wisdom.
1.cn: 愚妄人以行恶为戏耍。明哲人却以智慧为乐。

2.en: A wise man turns down the current into, a fool to put down when despair - you can put down how much, happiness is how many.
2.cn: 智者把放下当前进，愚者把放下当绝望——你能放下多少，幸福就有多少。

3.en: The angry wife said she was blind in choosing him, who said answering a fool according his folly that the sight of her made him sick.
3.cn: 妻子在火头上，说她当初找他真是瞎了眼。他呢，也真够傻的，说他一见她就恶心。

0.cn: 快亲她呀，你这个聪明的大傻瓜。

1.en: I will not pay to have some crackpot old fool teach him magic tricks.
1.cn: 我可不会出钱让一个老疯子老傻瓜教这小子变戏法。

2.en: And what to say about Darwin, whom everybody took for a fool when he put forth his Theory of Evolution.
2.cn: 还有达尔文，他提出进化论时被当成傻瓜。

3.en: No, it's not. What, you really believe that you're gonna be a singer? Well, yeah, maybe. Well, then you're just as big a fool as I am!
3.cn: 才不是呢。怎么不是，你以为你真的能成为一个歌手吗？也许我可以。那你就是跟我一样的傻瓜！

4.en: You took his place. He is my father. He's a fool. And so are you. Belle. Papa! Don't hurt him! Papa! No! I'll come back! I promise!
4.cn: 你来替他。他是我爸爸。他是个傻瓜。你也是。贝儿。爸爸！别弄伤他！爸爸! 不！我会回来的!

5.en: You're a fool, Donald. You always were. You and your dumb, dead wife that you never, ever shut up about. Principled? Idealistic? A champion for the people?
5.cn: 你是个傻瓜，唐纳德，一直都是。你和你三句不离的那个蠢亡妻，有原则，理想主义？捍卫人民？

6.en: Made a fool of me? Really? No, I just…
6.cn: 戏弄我，有吗？不是，我只是...

7.en: Gotta be a pretty good fake to fool Glasses.
7.cn: 能骗过眼镜儿，肯定够逼真啊。

8.en: No, Erik. Erik. Our fool. He was the funniest fool I ever met.
8.cn: 不，埃里克。埃里克？我们的小丑。我见过的最滑稽的小丑。

10.en: Always a proud day, when they come of age. You can fool them, but you can't fool me.
10.cn: 而这一刻真应该好好纪念一下，你骗得了他们，可是你骗不了我的。

11.en: Oh, you can fool yourself and everyone else, but you can't fool me. I know who you are.
11.cn: 你能欺骗你自己和别人，但你可骗不了我。我知道你是谁。

12.en: And I hope she'll be a fool. That's the best thing a girl in this world can be. A beautiful little fool.
12.cn: 我希望她做个傻姑娘，傻姑娘才是最幸福的，美丽的傻姑娘。

13.en: You won't fool a fly or me. I'm not gonna drink it.
13.cn: 你休想愚弄我，我是不会喝的。

14.en: You won't make a fool of yourself. It's in your blood.
14.cn: 你才不会出洋相呢，你有遗传天份。

15.en: Don't be a fool, Katniss. I know you never wanted the rebellion.
15.cn: 别那么傻，凯特尼斯，我知道你从不曾想要起义的。

16.en: I made a huge fool of myself and I came back, that shows courage.
16.cn: 我大出洋相之后还敢回来，这显示我有勇气。

17.en: Someone followed you through the jump point. Set me free. You'll need my help. I'm not a fool, Nebula. You are a fool to deprive yourself a hand in combat.
17.cn: 有人跟着你穿过跳跃点了。放开我。我会帮你们的。我们又不傻，星云。你就是傻，不然怎么会插手这场战斗。

18.en: But I've never even played Quidditch. What if I make a fool of myself?
18.cn: 可我从没打过魁地奇，要是出了洋相怎么办？

19.en: What, you're gonna run against the Joneses? You'll make a fool of yourself, Claire.
19.cn: 怎么，你要跟琼斯母女竞争吗？你会出丑的，克莱尔。
